metadata.title: CVE-2025-0518 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Unchecked Return Value, Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in FFmpeg allowsRead Sensitive Constants Within an Executable. This vulnerability isassociated with program fileshttps://github.Com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/master/libavfilter/af_pan.C .This issue affects FFmpeg: 7.1.Issue was fixed:https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/b5b6391d64807578ab872dc58fb8aa621dcfc38ahttps://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/b5b6391d64807578ab872dc58fb8aa621dcfc38aThis issue was discovered by: Simcha Kosman

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
